website_summaries.verdict: For big breakfast parties, this pastel, sturdy steel toaster makes a very functional centerpiece.
pros: Preset programming for bagels as well as reheat and defrost settings
Extra-long, wide slots hold two bread slices apiece
Big bagels fit this toaster, too
Good control range on toast settings
cons: Heavy and large, this toaster will take up quite a bit of counter space
Removable crumb tray is just average

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this toaster in August. In October it burst into flames and blew the breakers in my kitchen. I contacted the seller but they just passed me on to Smeg, who haven’t contacted me yet. I should’ve gone with a $25 toaster that would’ve lasted 15 years like the one I replaced with this piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: CANDICE LANGSTON

customer_reviews.title: but SMEG's customer service is wonderful and sent us a new one since it was ...
customer_reviews.text: This stopped toasting on both sides of the bread after a while, but SMEG's customer service is wonderful and sent us a new one since it was still under warranty. Aesthetically it looks great on our counter top - we get lots of compliments on it. Hopefully this one lasts.
customer_reviews.author: fadeintoyou

customer_reviews.title: One sided toast
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. It has stopped toasting on both sides since the middle coils are not hot. Contacting Smeg and will evaluate and post my experience.
customer_reviews.author: cmj

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT !
customer_reviews.text: What I liked about this toaster was that it looks great ! What I didn't like about this Toaster is ,that this (2nd LEMON !) only lasted 4 months ! The first one lasted about 6 months ! Hint : Do not waste your time or money on this product !
customer_reviews.author: John G. Lovelace Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Color great, toaster not so much
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the color, but this toaster is huge. In addition, the toasting is VERY uneven and takes forever to toast a piece of bread.
customer_reviews.author: not a shill

customer_reviews.title: So pretty
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It looks so nice on the counter of the kitchen. Very easy to use. It does have a tray to remove crumbs and it is very useful, but some crumbs still get stuck on the side and have to be removed in other ways.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but problem lever
customer_reviews.text: Loved it at first, handle lever broke making toaster not useable within one month.
customer_reviews.author: anne weinstock

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster! The better I ever had
customer_reviews.text: Great toaster ! The better I ever had. And the line and the color adds to his great performance. I am in love with my tres chic toaster!
customer_reviews.author: BL

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Mine looks and works great. Very pleased. Perfect toast at 1.5
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this toaster sleek, gorgeous and toasts great of course but wow it looks good lol
customer_reviews.author: susan griffin

customer_reviews.title: ... it to my daughter for her anniversary and they love it. Thinking of noting another one for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my daughter for her anniversary and they love it. Thinking of noting another one for my son for his anniversary
customer_reviews.author: Rhoda

customer_reviews.title: I loved it there was nothing I did not like about it
customer_reviews.text: I loved it there was nothing I did not like about it
customer_reviews.author: Karen ciriello

customer_reviews.title: ... toasters before but this one is by far the best!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned expensive toasters before but this one is by far the best!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy K

customer_reviews.title: Minor quibble, sleek design.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design. Haven't used a toaster for year (have even using a toaster oven) so can't remember if they drop as many crumbs out from the botto as this one seems to. The toast sometime pops all the way out and onto the counter so don't keep it to close to the edge cuz it's about to drop! Like the defrost feature and the bagel mode (toasts one side only).
customer_reviews.author: Ave Bagan

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so in love with this toaster !! It works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Nessa

customer_reviews.title: Defective/doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: I love the look but toast literally flies out of the toaster like projectile. When I contacted Amazon about the problem, the seller had changed. Now, the toaster doesn’t work at all. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: deecee

customer_reviews.title: I was so happy with my first Smeg toaster
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy with my first Smeg toaster, I bought a second for my commute-apartment. I particularly like the wide range of the darkness (or done-ness) control--I can get even moist, slow-toasting breads nicely brown, with some control range left over. The first toaster has already lasted longer than the Cuisinart it replaced, too.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Harriman

customer_reviews.title: I love SMEG
customer_reviews.text: I love SMEG, I love my little toaster, my electric kettle, and this big toaster. Perfectly fits four pieces of regular bread or two pieces of artisan bread (what I bought it for). Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Beaverhausen

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We love this toaster! It's sturdy. It works great. And it's cute design makes my wife happy.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Rice

customer_reviews.title: Rolls Royce of toasters.
customer_reviews.text: The most perfect toaster ever. It's beautiful and toasts better than any toaster I've ever had. Loke you dont realize how bad your previous toaster is until you get this one lol
customer_reviews.author: The Smiths

customer_reviews.title: Looks as good as it works!
customer_reviews.text: I love this it is so easy and clean and lively too works awesome
customer_reviews.author: ameerah Al Sahraa

customer_reviews.title: The retro look and the slim profile is perfect. The color is fun and fits with our ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this toaster! The retro look and the slim profile is perfect. The color is fun and fits with our decor.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Beware of Pastel Green Color
customer_reviews.text: This is not the actual color of the toaster. I returned it for the light blue one.
customer_reviews.author: Patty T

customer_reviews.title: Premium price for garbage
customer_reviews.text: Broke in under a year, started making dangerous sparking sound. Didn't have reciept so was instantly rejected by warranty & claims, would not buy Smeg again.
customer_reviews.author: Malenfant

product_meta.title: Smeg TSF02PKUS 50's Retro Style Aesthetic 4 Slice Toaster, Pink
product_meta.description: Color:PinkSmeg 50's retro style appliances will add a pop to any kitchen! With a powder coated steel body, polished chrome base, stainless steel ball lever knob and backlit chrome knob, Smeg toasters are made to last and will never go out of style.
feature_bullets: 2 extra wide slots with self-centering racks
6 browning levels and 3 pre-set programs: reheat, defrost, bagel

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars10 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
